scripts.vercel-build: npm --prefix sveltekit_app install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix sveltekit_app run build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const src=path.join(process.cwd(),'sveltekit_app','.vercel','output'); const dst=path.join(process.cwd(),'.vercel','output'); fs.rmSync(dst,{recursive:true,force:true}); fs.mkdirSync(path.dirname(dst),{recursive:true}); fs.cpSync(src,dst,{recursive:true});"
